text: Nabbi waabwe kwekubaanukula nti mazima Katonda alonze Twaluta okuba kabaka wamwe. Bo kwekugamba nti ayinza atya okuba kabaka waffe songa ffe tusaanira obwâ€™akabaka okumusinga, ng'era teyaweebwa bugazi bwa byanfuna. (Nabbi waabwe) n'abagamba nti Mukama Katonda amulonze mu mmwe era n'amwongera obugazi mu kumanya ne mu mubiri. Era Katonda awa obufuzi bwe oyo gwaba ayagadde. Era Katonda mugazi era mumanyi
